chapters.title: Chapter 42:  Before the Stone of Tear
chapters.info: High Lord Torean Andiama, p. 662—Potato-nosed High Lord of Tear. He looks more like a farmer than most farmers, despite being the richest man in Tear. He was charged with financing the Cairhienin campaign. His son Estean was also involved in the battle. He has since returned to Tear.
